verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Fret not <S%H408>thyself<s%> <S%H2734><s%> because of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be thou <S%H7065>envious<s%> against the <S%H6213>workers<s%> of <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> they shall <S%H4120>soon<s%> be cut <S%H5243>down<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> and <S%H5034>wither<s%> as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb.<s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> so shalt thou <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H530>verily<s%> thou shalt be <S%H7462>fed.<s%>
Delight <S%H6026>thyself<s%> also <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> also <S%H5921>in<s%> him; and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall bring it to <S%H6213>pass.<s%>
And he shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H216>light,<s%> and thy <S%H4941>judgment<s%> as the <S%H6672>noonday.<s%>

Rest <S%H1826><s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and wait <S%H2342>patiently<s%> for him: fret not <S%H408>thyself<s%> <S%H2734><s%> because of him who <S%H6743>prospereth<s%> in his <S%H1870>way,<s%> because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who bringeth wicked devices to <S%H6213>pass.<s%> <S%H4209><s%>
Cease <S%H7503><s%> from <S%H4480>anger,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath:<s%> fret not <S%H408>thyself<s%> <S%H2734><s%> in any <S%H389>wise<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off:<s%> but those that wait <S%H6960>upon<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H369>not<s%> be: yea, thou shalt diligently <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall <S%H369>not<s%> be.
But the <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and shall delight <S%H6026>themselves<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plotteth<s%> against the <S%H6662>just,<s%> and <S%H2786>gnasheth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him with his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at him: <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have drawn <S%H6605>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to cast <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> and to <S%H2873>slay<s%> such as be of <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H1870>conversation.<s%>
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
A <S%H4592>little<s%> that a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man hath is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H4480>riches<s%> <S%H1995><s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>upright:<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> in the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time:<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they shall be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be as the <S%H3368>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs:<s%> they shall <S%H3615>consume;<s%> into <S%H6227>smoke<s%> shall they consume <S%H3615>away.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3867>borroweth,<s%> and <S%H7999>payeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> again: but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> showeth <S%H2603>mercy,<s%> and <S%H5414>giveth.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> such as be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of him shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and they that be <S%H7043>cursed<s%> of him shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H4703>steps<s%> of a good <S%H1397>man<s%> are <S%H3559>ordered<s%> by the <S%H4480>LORD:<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and he <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Though <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H5307>fall,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be utterly cast <S%H2904>down:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5288>young,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> now am <S%H2204>old;<s%> yet have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> nor his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
He is <S%H3605>ever<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H2603>merciful,<s%> and <S%H3867>lendeth;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed.<s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> they are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> but the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>therein<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>speaketh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1696>talketh<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of his <S%H838>steps<s%> shall <S%H4571>slide.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>watcheth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him when he is <S%H8199>judged.<s%>

Wait <S%H6960><s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> thee to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> it.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in great <S%H6184>power,<s%> and spreading <S%H6168>himself<s%> like a <S%H7488>green<s%> bay <S%H249>tree.<s%>
Yet he passed <S%H5674>away,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he was <S%H369>not:<s%> yea, I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, but he could <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found.<s%>
Mark <S%H8104><s%> the <S%H8535>perfect<s%> man, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H3477>upright:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> of that <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
But the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is of the <S%H4480>LORD:<s%> <S%H3068><s%> he is their <S%H4581>strength<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> them, and <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them: he shall <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them from the <S%H4480>wicked,<s%> <S%H7563><s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
